oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.attachments.uiModel.view.listener
Class AttachmentsRowSetListener

java.lang.Object
  oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.attachments.uiModel.view.listener.AttachmentsRowSetListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, oracle.jbo.RowNavigationListener, oracle.jbo.RowSetListener
public class AttachmentsRowSetListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements oracle.jbo.RowSetListener

Row Set Listener for all Attachments VO Row Sets to ensure that the order in which the attachments rows are added is consistent irrespective of whether the row was inserted by calling a variant of insertRow or by association consistency.

Since:
release specific (what release of product did this appear in)
